targets.expr:
sum by(label_tenantId,namespace) (
	(sum by(pod_name,namespace)(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"^$namespace",container_name=""}[1m]))) * on(pod_name) 
	group_left(label_tenantId) (label_join(kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"^$namespace",label_tenantId=~"^$tenantId",label_tenantId!="",label_apsInstance=~"$apsInstance"}
,"pod_name",",","pod")))
/

sum by(label_tenantId,namespace)(
  (sum by(pod,namespace)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"^$namespace",resource="cpu",pod=~"^.*"}))
  *on(pod)group_left(label_tenantId)
  (
    (kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"^$namespace",label_tenantId=~"^$tenantId",label_apsInstance=~"$apsInstance",label_projectId=~"^$projectId"})*on(pod)group_left()
    (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})
  )
) *100
